## Youtube ad analysis

This report looks at the ads collected from YouTube and summarizes some key details. It includes the relevancy, their average length, and a breakdown of different ad types. Two bar charts help visualise the data. For more details on using R Markdown see <http://rmarkdown.rstudio.com>.
```{r, echo=FALSE}
knitr::include_graphics("statsgraph2.PNG")
```
